com.intel.fightclub.cloud.upload

Class FitUploadTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.cloud.SingleTask<java.util.List<java.io.File>>
      • com.intel.fightclub.cloud.upload.FitUploadTask

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class FitUploadTask
extends SingleTask<java.util.List<java.io.File>>
    Handles backing up FIT files. This is conditionally threadsafe provided that the files are not modified during upload.

        file - A file.

        Prepares a Single for the upload.
        Specified by:
        prepare in class SingleTask<java.util.List<java.io.File>>
        Returns:
